text.page:
232
096-116b @#/ /rma 'byor bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM u bas u bas/ /sum sum sarba nan rbad swA hA/ hU~M phaT/ sha ma shA n+ti ku ru swA hA/ lan gsum brjod de rma la mchil ma byugs na rdos phog pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / rtsa chad pa dang / klad pa chad pa rnams sos par byed do/ /rma 'byor bar byed pa'i gzungs sngags rdzogs so//
